name: bluesky_scrape_feed
description: Scrape a user's feed/timeline on Bluesky. Returns recent posts with content, engagement stats, and timestamps.

steps.code: const posts = []; const feedItems = document.querySelectorAll('[data-testid^="feedItem-by-"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(feedItems.length, 20); i++) { const el = feedItems[i]; const contentEl = el.querySelector('[data-testid="postText"]'); const likeBtn = el.querySelector('[data-testid="likeBtn"]'); const replyBtn = el.querySelector('[data-testid="replyBtn"]'); const timeEl = el.querySelector('time'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/post/"]'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img[src*="feed_"], img[src*="cdn"]'); posts.push({ content: contentEl ? contentEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 500) : '', likes: likeBtn ? (likeBtn.getAttribute('aria-label') || '') : '', replies: replyBtn ? (replyBtn.getAttribute('aria-label') || '') : '', time: timeEl ? (timeEl.getAttribute('datetime') || timeEl.textContent.trim()) : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '', has_image: !!imgEl }); } const nameEl = document.querySelector('[data-testid="profileHeaderDisplayName"]'); return { handle: '{{handle}}', display_name: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : '', post_count: posts.length, posts: posts, url: window.location.href }
steps.name: feed_data
steps.label: Extract feed posts
